-----Original Message-----
From: James Schuldes [mailto:jgs@...]
Sent: Wednesday, February 28, 2001 10:32 AM
To: 'eqbards@yahoogroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] "Useless" songs


We were kinda desparate for a spot one night and ended up pulling 'shrooms
in lower Seb. And bored, so I memmed this in and *thought* I could see some
difference, i.e. shorther fights - less heals by the mobs. But, ya, that
was the only time I ever used it. Rumor is that in PvP, mana drain from
this is actually somewhat effective, e.g.: "... there I wuz... I mezzed him
and twisted Dissention so he had to sit there and watch his mana bar
dropping... then I charmed him and walked him under water while twisting my
endure breath song..., then I dropped dirge on him and finished him off in
one nuke! Then I woke up..."

Sylly
